reviews.text: I don't think there is a lot of choice for business travelers in Delemont, as the city is fairly small and has ample hotel options.
reviews.title: Probably the best business hotel - but not impressive

reviews.text: The Ibis is very centrally located - 2 minutes from the train station. Reception was standard, a very indifferent lady who did not really help me at all. She was simply like: 'here is your key, breakfast is from 6 to 10 and the elevator is over there. Have a good stay'. I asked around for restaurants and options but she was not really a helpful type of person.
reviews.title: excellant customer service

reviews.text: The room was at the back overlooking the hotels 'garden'. A very small room and very small bathroom. I paid about 125 CHF whcih equals 100/105 euros. Not a bad price for Switzerland, but it was a very very boring hotel. Breakfast was equally boring,...
reviews.title: Good value, great staff

reviews.text: Hotel was very clean, wifi worked fine,
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, excellent value and a credit to Ibis brand

reviews.text: Stayed here on the way home from Italy. Totally surprised at the standard of the hotel and the wonderful service from the staff. They were genuinely there to help you and were pleased to do so.it was not just a job to them. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Large hot shower. I thought that we may have been bothered by noise as close to the train station and on a main road but this was not the case - goood nights sleep had by all.
reviews.title: Super Value / Good Location / Well Maintained Rooms

reviews.text: The hotel is well located a short walk from the station, the reception staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast is fine rather than sumptous and overall good value for money
reviews.title: Super value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice and modern place, centrally located near old town and railway station. Rooms small but clean, staff very friendly and helpful. I've tried a few other hotels in Delemont, Ibis offers by far best service and value.
reviews.title: Fair value

reviews.text: We stayed here for a few days while my son took part in the Skater Hockey European Cup in Delemont. This hotel is new so is in very good condition. The room was clean and with a comfy bed, great shower and air conditionig.
reviews.title: Good value in Switzerland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did enjoy a beer from the bar and you can sit inside, outide at the front or on a terrace at the rear of the hotel.
reviews.title: Very clean and brand new

reviews.text: Delemont is a pleasant small town with a historic centre, in the Jura canton, about 35mins by train from Basel. The Ibis is a short and easy walk from the station. The hotel had been open less than two months when I spent a long weekend in April 2011.
reviews.title: Nice new Ibis
